Package com.flipkart.dao

Class BookingDAO

java.lang.Object
com.flipkart.dao.BookingDAO
public class BookingDAO extends Object
DAO class for handling booking-related operations in the Flipkart system. This class manages the CRUD operations related to bookings in the Flipkart system, including adding, retrieving, cancelling bookings, and checking for overlaps.

  • Method Details

    • addBooking

      public void addBooking(String userName, String scheduleID) throws BookingFailedException
      Adds a booking for a user into the database.
      Parameters:
      userName - Username of the customer making the booking
      scheduleID - ID of the schedule being booked
      Throws:
      BookingFailedException - if the booking operation fails

    • getBookingByCustomerId

      public List<FlipFitBooking> getBookingByCustomerId(String customerId) throws BookingFailedException
      Retrieves all bookings made by a customer using their customerId.
      Parameters:
      customerId - ID of the customer whose bookings are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      List of FlipFitBooking objects representing the bookings
      Throws:
      BookingFailedException - if the retrieval operation fails

    • getCustomerPlan

      public List<UserPlan> getCustomerPlan(String customerId)
      Retrieves all user plans (bookings) for a customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - ID of the customer whose plans are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      List of UserPlan objects representing the customer's plans

    • checkBookingOverlap

      public boolean checkBookingOverlap(String customerId, Date date, LocalTime localTime)
      Checks if a booking overlaps with existing bookings for a customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - ID of the customer
      date - Date of the booking
      localTime - Time of the booking
      Returns:
      true if there is an overlap, false otherwise

    • cancelBookingById

      public void cancelBookingById(String bookingID) throws BookingFailedException
      Cancels a booking based on its booking ID.
      Parameters:
      bookingID - ID of the booking to be cancelled
      Throws:
      BookingFailedException - if the cancellation operation fails

    • getBookingByBookingId

      public FlipFitBooking getBookingByBookingId(String bookingId) throws BookingFailedException
      Retrieves a booking based on its booking ID.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - ID of the booking to retrieve
      Returns:
      FlipFitBooking object representing the booking
      Throws:
